basics.name: Ousmane Thiongane
basics.summary: Passionate about Computer Vision and Robotics, I like to handle the different technologies offered by the digital world.

work.name: Pollen Robotics x Hugging Face, Bordeaux, France
work.summary: Master internship - Adaptation of teleoperation instruction for intrinsic and extrinsic Reachy2 robot constraints. State of the art on methods for the constrained formulation of the inverse kinematics problem. Formulation of a general constrained quadratic optimization problem in the context of teleoperation. Software implementation, simulation tests and evaluation on the real robot. Internship co-supervised with the Inria Auctus research team (Vincent Padois).

education.institution: Ecole Nationale Superieure de l'Electronique et de ses Applications
